work.summary: Renuo is a web agency specialized in Ruby on Rails and Angular. Among my duties and accomplishments are:
highlights: The development of a Ruby on Rails and Angular 2 single page application for a big insurance company.
I am in charge of all the servers, I cleaned them up and promoted a shift towards a serverless architecture.
I train and help interns and junior developers through pair programming, live coding and presentations.
I deepen my knowledge of functional programming and other technologies: React + Redux, Elixir, Elm, etc.

work.summary: As part of my studies I undertook an internship, and later wrote my thesis, at the Institute of Radioastronomy, writing a software spectrum analyzer. The main highlights were:
highlights: The development of a spectrum analyzer using the Intel IPP C++ library's implementation of the Fast Fourier Transform.
Created a modular structure to allow the addition of filters and other transformations.
Programmed an UDP interface to receive the raw signals from the radio telescopes.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
